meanings.definition: The skill, practice, or sport of fighting with the fists; boxing.
meanings.sent1: He trained hard to improve his pugilisms and become a better boxer.
meanings.sent2: The gym was filled with the sounds of pugilisms as boxers practiced their moves.
meanings.sent3: During the match, his pugilisms were so precise that his opponent couldn't keep up.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her pugilisms was like a well-choreographed dance in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the boxer's pugilisms landed powerful blows on his opponent.

meanings.definition: A fight with the fists; a boxing match.
meanings.sent1: The crowd gathered to watch the exciting pugilisms between the two champions.
meanings.sent2: In the world of sports, pugilisms have always been a popular form of entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The pugilisms between the siblings over the last piece of cake were intense but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The political debate turned into a verbal pugilism between the candidates.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the final pugilism as a battle of wills between good and evil.
